name: VISUAL APPLE II OS ENCRYPTED
description: This is an Operating System prototype i have developed by my pure imagination in Hackfest 2020 under Kansasfest. It holds name of the virtual "10 folders" and "10 files" inside the folders. When you recall under prompt after entering all 10 entrys the name of one folder you get the name of the respective files. There are also commands to see memory of the computer, reset the process and go back and delete folder.
